channel.title: Server status saysmy server is offline
channel.description: Hey all, i went 2 the server status too Register my new Server, and it said its offline..i have a Hamachi and a normal ip for my server..do u think it being registerd on Hamachi has anything too do with it?pleas help

item.title: Server status saysmy server is offline
item.dc:creator: @Jukesy Jukesy
item.description:
@Jukesy wrote:

mate i read the guide…all it says is a website…the website DOES NOT tell me what it does too help me get up my server does it? no, Therefore that is my QUESTION " what does port forwarding do"?

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 08:41:39 PM[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
